Entries.2000003_VictorTalk: pause 1200/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 1000/speak Victor "Mom...$2"/pause 600/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Mom, I enjoyed what I studied in school.$0#$b#The reason I've turned down job offers is because I know exactly what I want to do with my life, and it doesn't involve internships in the city.$6"/pause 1250/speak Victor "I want to build and maintain bridges. Not just any bridges, but the bridges here in the valley and surrounding provinces.$3"/pause 500/showFrame Victor 43/pause 600/speak Victor "This was going to be a surprise. I didn't want to tell you until it was official but...$2"/pause 100/emote Olivia 8/pause 200/showFrame Victor 4/pause 300/speak Victor "I've been working closely with Kendra, the mayor of Grampleton, and their bridge engineer, Ralph. He recently retired.$3#$b#Ralph is responsible for constructing and managing the bridges in the region, including the ones here in Pelican town.$1"/pause 150/emote Olivia 16/pause 200/speak Olivia "Are you saying you...?$6"/pause 500/speak Victor "Yes. I'm an apprentice.$1#$b#Ralph is teaching me the ins and outs of bridge construction and maintenance. I've been waiting for a position like this to open up for a long time.$3"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Honey! This is incredible news! I wish you had told me sooner.$1"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/pause 400/speak Victor "I thought it'd be best to tell you when it was official so I didn't get your hopes up if it didn't happen.$2#$b#But I probably should have told you sooner, since you've been so worried about my future.$2"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Those notes in my diary are very old, from a time when I was feeling frustrated and lacking direction. Now I know what I want to do with my life.$6"/pause 500/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/speak Olivia "...$2"/pause 650/speak Olivia "I... I'm sorry for violating your privacy, honey. It was unfair to assume you were putting off work to keep living here.$2"/pause 1250/speak Victor "Part of that is true, Mother. I don't want to move away from Stardew Valley. Leaving my friends and the valley would make me miserable.$6#$b#If I had moved to the city and gotten an office job, I'd be nothing but a cog in a machine, unable to chase my dreams.$2"/pause 1100/speak Victor "I feel like I can achieve so much more if I control my own destiny. And right now, working with Ralph, I can.$1"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Honey, I'm so proud of you!$1"/pause 500/speak Victor "Thank you, mother!$3"/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "We celebrated Victoria's internship with the finest aged Blue Moon Vineyard wine and exchanged laughs."/stopMusic/pause 1000/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "Hi, @. I'm sorry you got caught between my mother and me. I didn't want to let anyone know about my apprenticeship until I knew it was for certain.$6#$b#Getting the internship doesn't mean my future is secure. I have a lot of learning and work ahead of me, but I'm happy to know which direction my life is heading.$3#$e#Thank you for being a good friend.$1"

Don't you want to have a successful career?$2"/pause 1350/speak Victor "...$2"/pause 1850/shake Olivia 1500/pause 700/speak Olivia "ANSWER ME!$5"/pause 400/speak Victor "I DIDN'T KNOW WHAT I WANTED TO DO!$5"/pause 500/emote Olivia 16/pause 400/move Olivia 0 -1 0/pause 400/speak Olivia "That's all you have to say for yourself?! After all the money I spent sending you to Pellcar University?...$5"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 250/speak Olivia "Victoria, I'm buying a one-bedroom apartment for you in Zuzu City. I'll give you some starting money, and then I'm cutting you off.$0"/pause 300/emote Victor 16/pause 500/shake Victor 1000/pause 500/speak Olivia "You're moving out, Victoria. Now. Maybe being back in the city without my bank account to rely on will inspire you to start living your life.$5"/pause 500/speak Victor "Mom, no! Please, just let me explain! I have a reaso-$7"/speak Olivia "There is nothing to explain, Victoria. This is for your own good.$2"/emote Victor 28/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 1/move farmer 5 0 0/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 2/stopMusic/pause 200/emote Olivia 16/pause 200/speak Olivia "!!!$7"/pause 200/speed Victor 4/move Victor -1 0 2/speed Victor 4/move Victor 0 1 2/pause 250/speak Victor "@!?$7"/pause 600/speak Olivia "You were eavesdropping on our conversation!?$5"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#I came by to read some of Victoria's books and I heard you two arguing."/fork 2000003_Eavesdropping/end
Entries.2000003_Eavesdropping: pause 500/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Victor "Mom. Please. Let me talk so you can understand my side of the story. At least give me that.$2"/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 1000/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 1200/speak Olivia "Okay.$2"/pause 750/question fork1 "#Don't say anything#Listen to your mom and move to the city."/fork 2000003_VictorTalk/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 2/emote Victor 16/pause 400/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 300/speak Victor "!!!$7"/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 800/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Olivia "See, Victoria? Even @ agrees it would be in your best interest to move to Zuzu City.$0#$b#This is the best path to get you out of this slump, honey.$0"/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 0/pause 400/shake Victor 700/pause 700/speak Victor "...$2"/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 750/speak Olivia "Thank you for your input, @. Victoria and I will continue discussing this matter. Alone. You may leave.$0"/pause 500/emote Victor 28/pause 600/speed farmer 2/move farmer -6 0 3 true/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Victor -1250/end dialogue Victor "Why did you agree with my father about sending me to Zuzu City? It took me hours to talk her down.$2#$b#I'm not just wasting my life here. I'm starting an apprenticeship with a retired bridge builder in Grampleton.$0#$b#I thought you were my friend, but you hurt my feelings and betrayed my trust...$2#$e#Don't talk to me right now, @.$5#$e#%Victoria is now ignoring you."
Entries.2000003_VictorTalk: pause 1200/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 1000/speak Victor "Mom...$2"/pause 600/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Mom, I enjoyed what I studied in school.$0#$b#The reason I've turned down job offers is because I know exactly what I want to do with my life, and it doesn't involve internships in the city.$6"/pause 1250/speak Victor "I want to build and maintain bridges. Not just any bridges, but the bridges here in the valley and surrounding provinces.$3"/pause 500/showFrame Victor 43/pause 600/speak Victor "This was going to be a surprise. I didn't want to tell you until it was official but...$2"/pause 100/emote Olivia 8/pause 200/showFrame Victor 4/pause 300/speak Victor "I've been working closely with Kendra, the mayor of Grampleton, and their bridge engineer, Ralph. He recently retired.$3#$b#Ralph is responsible for constructing and managing the bridges in the region, including the ones here in Pelican town.$1"/pause 150/emote Olivia 16/pause 200/speak Olivia "Are you saying you...?$6"/pause 500/speak Victor "Yes. I'm an apprentice.$1#$b#Ralph is teaching me the ins and outs of bridge construction and maintenance. I've been waiting for a position like this to open up for a long time.$3"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Honey! This is incredible news! I wish you had told me sooner.$1"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/pause 400/speak Victor "I thought it'd be best to tell you when it was official so I didn't get your hopes up if it didn't happen.$2#$b#But I probably should have told you sooner, since you've been so worried about my future.$2"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Those notes in my diary are very old, from a time when I was feeling frustrated and lacking direction. Now I know what I want to do with my life.$6"/pause 500/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/speak Olivia "...$2"/pause 650/speak Olivia "I... I'm sorry for violating your privacy, honey. It was unfair to assume you were putting off work to keep living here.$2"/pause 1250/speak Victor "Part of that is true, Father. I don't want to move away from Stardew Valley. Leaving my friends and the valley would make me miserable.$6#$b#If I had moved to the city and gotten an office job, I'd be nothing but a cog in a machine, unable to chase my dreams.$2"/pause 1100/speak Victor "I feel like I can achieve so much more if I control my own destiny. And right now, working with Ralph, I can.$1"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Honey, I'm so proud of you!$1"/pause 500/speak Victor "Thank you, father!$3"/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "We celebrated Victoria's internship with the finest aged Blue Moon Vineyard wine and exchanged laughs."/stopMusic/pause 1000/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "Hi, @. I'm sorry you got caught between my father and me. I didn't want to let anyone know about my apprenticeship until I knew it was for certain.$6#$b#Getting the internship doesn't mean my future is secure. I have a lot of learning and work ahead of me, but I'm happy to know which direction my life is heading.$3#$e#Thank you for being a good friend.$1"

Entries.4000002/f Olivia 1000/f Jodi 250/f Carol: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 29 89 0 Olivia 24 72 3 Jodi 22 72 1 Caroline 23 71 2 Penny 7 65 2 Lewis 31 67 1 Pierre 33 67 3 MarlonFay 33 103 2 Wizard 33 105 0 Gus 42 72 2 Abigail 47 88 0 Haley 16 90 3 Emily 14 90 1 Linus 104 104 2 Clint 97 77 0 Victor 40 16 0/pause 400/showFrame Penny 18/skippable/viewport 23 72 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -16 3 true/speak Jodi "That's hilarious, Olivia. That is what I mean, Lewis."/pause 200/move farmer -6 0 0 true/pause 2400/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 300/move Caroline 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Caroline "@, I heard about %farm Farm on the radio a few days ago. You're making so much progress!$0"/speak Jodi "Oh, yes! You are, @. You've helped our little community to grow.$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak Olivia "Vineyards are quite profitable in this region. I heard rumors about how much Sophia makes each quarter.$3"/speak Caroline "How much is it!?"/speak Jodi "!!!$0"/pause 200/textAboveHead Lewis "I'm happy to hear that, Pierre."/pause 750/speak Olivia "It's over six figures!$1"/emote Jodi 16 true/pause 200/emote Caroline 16 true/pause 100/emote farmer 16 true/pause 750/speak Olivia "@. Have you considered turning %farm Farm into a vineyard, like Blue Moon Vineyard?$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 600/question fork0 "(What should I say?)#I'm already making wine.#Wine production isn't the path I want to go down.#I'm not at the level where I can make large amounts of wine yet."/fork 4000002_MakesWine/pause 500/speak Olivia "I understand. She ships her produce out of the valley.$6#$b#She once let me purchase one of her fresh melons. I think they're shipped to low income villages.$6"/pause 200/emote farmer 16 true/pause 300/emote Jodi 16/speak Caroline "It's true, Olivia. My husband and Andy had an argument recently.$2#$b#Pierre would only allow Andy's produce in the store if it was specifically labeled as: 'Grown at Fairhaven Farm'. Andy didn't like that...$2"/pause 400/speak Jodi "...$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 700/speak Olivia "Well, this conversation certainly turned sour.$2"/pause 1650/speak Olivia "@, we're going back to chatting about parenthood.$6"/pause 250/speak Caroline "It was nice seeing you, @!$0"/speak Jodi "Bye, @.$0"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 300/move farmer 8 0 1 true/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Olivia 25/end dialogue Olivia "Come chat with us again next time, dear.$3"

BeforeMovie.Text: Horror movie, huh? I might end up holding your hand.$2

AfterMovie.Text: My heart is beating fast after that thriller.$7

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah. This should be quite an interesting film.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Really puts the world in perspective. Do you think we'll ever visit the stars someday?$1

BeforeMovie.Text: You know, I never did beat this game. I'll watch it, though!$1

AfterMovie.Text: That was great. I want to play the game now!$3

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm looking forward to this movie.$1

AfterMovie.Text: This was a wonderful idea. Which part of the movie was your favorite?$3
Must say, I did enjoy myself. I appreciate you taking me out, @.$3

BeforeMovie.Text: At least the seats are comfy...$2

AfterMovie.Text: Err. The acting wasn't the best. I expected a bit more.$2

Visiting Shearwater Bridge I see.$1#$b#I'm doing some calculations on its structural integrity.$3"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 350/speak Victor "This bridge was built forty years ago, and at the time it was a triumph of engineering.$1#$b#Bridges fascinate me. They're so simple, but can have so much impact on people's lives.$1#$b#I've built models of a few famous ones. Someday, I want to build something on this scale.$3"/pause 600/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 650/move Victor 0 0 3/pause 850/speak Victor "There's a bridge engineer in Grampleton. His name is Ralph.#$b#When he needs help, I assist him with his work to get hands-on experience.$3"/pause 800/speak Victor "The physics and mathematics that go into bridge construction need to be absolutely flawless.$6#$b#Even a tiny mistake in a single calculation could lead to a major catastrophe.$2"/pause 1500/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 1050/showFrame Victor 19/pause 1100/showFrame Victor 16/pause 1400/showFrame Victor 19/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 0/pause 600/move Victor 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Victor "I'm returning to my residence. Need to run these calculations on my computer. It's been a pleasure speaking with you, @.$1"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "I ran those calculations I told you about. I think I've stumbled onto a real improvement plan for Shearwater Bridge!$1#$b#These structural upgrades could save 213,500g of maintenance costs over the next ten years. I should talk to Ralph right away!$1#$e#Doing work that takes a lot of brainpower makes me hungry. I wonder if there's leftover spaghetti.$3"

Entries.VictorDewey: Dear @,^^I'm writing to thank you for listening to me in the graveyard. I know conversations like that can be stressful. If Dewey ever returns, I know he'll be just as happy to have you for a friend as I am.^^  Sincerely, Victoria[#]Dewey

Entries.JenkinsHouse.2: Victoria has a GoStation 1 and a Super Neendo Entertainment System.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.7: "1001 Video Games to Play"^^You notice a bookmark in this book. Victoria must be in the middle of reading this.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.23: "Sin (A) Angle B at 140 degrees"^"Cos (A) Angle Z at 120 degrees"^"Angle C is tangent to Circle Z at coordinates 14.01.4"^"csc(x) equals -csc(x)cot(x)"^^... Victoria must be working on... something. Yes. Something.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.60: It's another Super Neendo Entertainment System. Victoria has two.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.62: Victoria's sheets are made of silk from the Gotoro Empire.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.63: To satisfy your curiosity, you take a peek in Victoria's dresser:^^She has boyshort panties with a heart pattern. Her name is embroidered into the tag too!
Entries.JenkinsHouse.73: The microwave has a pizza-flavored hot pocket in it. Victoria may have forgotten it?
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.17: You open the chest and find a note. You read it:^^"You cheated not only the game, but yourself. You didn't grow. You didn't improve. You took a shortcut and gained nothing. You experienced a hollow victory. Nothing was risked and nothing was gained. It's sad that you don't know the difference."

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Victor: I remember the last time we were up here. We've both grown so much since then. Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey there! You're the new owner of %farm Farm!$1#$b#I'm Victoria. It's a pleasure to meet you... @, is it?$3
Entries.dating_Victor_memory_twoweeks: Hey, I was hoping I'd see you today...$4#$e#%Victoria blushes at you.
Entries.divorced_Sophia: How could you, @? Sophia will never be the same after this. You broke her heart!$5#$e#%Victoria is ignoring you.
Entries.divorced_Olivia: My mother isn't taking the divorce very well...$2#$e#I believe it's wise if we took a break from talking to each other for a while. It just isn't very suitable right now. I hope you understand.$0#$e#%Victoria is ignoring you.
Entries.spring_Wed_1: It's been some time since I graduated from Pellcar University.$6#$b#My mother has been nagging me to get a job somewhere. Anywhere.$2#$e#I understand I need to find a job but... I just... I need more time.$2#$q 1001/1002 jobquestion_followup#Do you think I'm lazy because I haven't found a job yet?#$r 1001 50 jobquestion_no#You aren't lazy, Victoria. You need more time to decide what you want to do. Look at me! I didn't know what I was doing until recently.#$r 1002 0 jobquestion_neutral#You could try out a part-time internship to see if it's something you like. At least your mom would get off your back?#$r 1002 -125 jobquestion_yes#I wouldn't call it lazy but... you've been out of school for over a year, Victoria.
Entries.Sat: So, are you enjoying living in Stardew Valley?$0#$e#That's great.$0#$e#...$0#$e#Uhh. Alright. Great chat. I'll see you around I guess?$2#$e#Bye, @.$0#$e#%Victoria doesn't want to chat anymore.
Entries.Sun10: Ever thought about building more bridges at %farm Farm?$3#$e#Oh. Just asking for uhh... reasons.$2#$e#%You give Victoria a skeptical look.#$e#Hah. Nothing gets past you, does it, @?$3

Entries.spouseRoom_Sophia: Hey, you. Mind helping me choose which manga to read next?#$e#Oh, that one? I already read it.#$e#I've read that one too.#$e#*giggle* Never mind.$9#$e#I should buy some more manga soon. There's a great bookstore in Zuzu City.$1
Entries.fall_28: Brrr... it's so cold. Supposed to snow lots and lots tonight.$2#$b#The weather man said so on the television!$1#$e#You know, cuddling is a good way to get warm...$4#$e#%Sophia has a glint in her eye.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I lived alone in my parents' house for so long. It was a little scary, being there by myself when it got dark.$0#$b#So many sleepless nights...$2#$e#But now I actually look forward to the sun going down. Gives me an excuse to get close to you.$1#$e#Um. Want to cuddle tonight?$4
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: *yawn* sooo sleepy. Want to go to bed soon, @?$1#$e#Maybe I'll read in bed for a bit. In the middle of a manga!$9
Entries.Good_1: I thought it'd be tough managing Blue Moon Vineyard but it actually isn't so bad.$1
Entries.Neutral_3: Blue Moon Vineyard is doing well. It's a bit tough managing it from here, but I don't mind.$1
Entries.Neutral_6: You know, I feel like my parents would be proud of me if they saw my life now.$1#$e#Your grandpa would be, too.$1
Entries.Bad_3: My tummy aches...$2#$e#I think I ate too many snacks.$3
Entries.Bad_5: Hey... I'm hanging out with Victoria tomorrow.$0#$e#What will we be up to? None of your business.$3#$e#%Sophia turns away from you.

Entries.Resort_Bar: This mango smoothie Gus made for me is really tasty!$1
Entries.Resort: Hey, @! Did you see the little krabby on the shore?$1#$e#I tried catching it but the little guy ran away.$2
Entries.DesertFestival_Sophia: I'm struggling between what to get. Maybe I'll just close my eyes and point at the menu!$1
Entries.fall_1: So many grapes to harvest this season...$2#$e#O-oh. Um!$5#$b#Good luck to you, @! Have a productive fall!$9
Entries.fall_Thu8: Hey, you! We should watch some anime or read manga together soon!$1
Entries.sophia_event1: Th-thanks.$1#$b#I had to learn so many new things. It was really hard at first, but...$2#$b#I feel as if I've grown as a person.$1
Entries.married_Victor: So you and Victoria are married now? She's always been a nice friend to me. I'm happy for you two!$1
Entries.divorced_Victor: Victoria told me you two had a hard falling out...$2
Entries.Custom_JenkinsHouse_23_27: I'm watching anime with Victoria today.$1
Entries.summer_Sun8: Victoria and I don't see each other as often as we used to... I wonder what's up.$2#$e#Hey, I really like it when you visit. Wanna swap farmer stories?$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Victoria dropped off a book for you, sweetie.$6#$b#She said she thinks you'll enjoy it - it's a memoir from the early days of the Adventurer's Guild.$3#$e#I'm glad you two are getting along.$1
Entries.OneKid_0: I took my eye off %kid1 for a moment today, and they managed to get into my painting supplies!$6#$b#Our walls narrowly escaped an explosion of creativity.$1#$e#Maybe %kid1 will grow up to be a painter, too...$3
Entries.TwoKids_4: Two kids at once are certainly a lot to manage. I could hardly keep up with them today.$6#$e#I'm not as young as I used to be, @.$2#$b#...I hope that doesn't bother you...$2#$e#%You hug Olivia.#$e#!!!$9
Entries.spring_24: I can't decide which dress I should choose for the dance today.$1#$b#I want to make sure it goes well with what you're wearing.$3#$b#I wish we went dancing more. It's so enchanting, being in your arms, listening to beautiful songs and surrounded by friends.$8
Entries.fall_27: I confess I don't really see the appeal of Spirit's Eve. The things that are meant to be scary always just seem a little silly.$0#$e#And many of the decorations are just a bit...tacky.$2
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: There are many rainy nights like this in the Gotoro Empire.$0#$e#I hope everyone there is okay.$2
Entries.OneKid_2: %kid1 has been quite the handful today. We had a record-breaking tantrum at naptime.$6#$b#Victoria never threw tantrums. Maybe they get it from you, honey...$2#$b#What were you like as a child, I wonder?$4
Entries.OneKid_3: %kid1 reminds me so much of Victoria at this age. So fond of listening to stories.$1
Entries.TwoKids_2: You know, after Victoria, I swore off having children, but I don't regret starting a family with you at all.$3#$b#This is a new chapter for me, and I'm so happy to be living it with you.$1
Entries.TwoKids_3: I really love our little family here, sweetie.$1#$b#Let's try to all go out together soon when you aren't too busy with work. Maybe to the beach, or the park? Victoria can come too.$3
Entries.Rainy_Night_Olivia: Do you think we should check on Victoria?$0#$b#She can get very moody on rainy nights. I'm afraid she got that from me.$2
Entries.Outdoor_1: The air on the farm smells so clean.$3#$b#If Victoria comes over, we should have a picnic outside. She could use some fresh air.$0
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Do you think we should check on Victoria?$0#$b#She can get very moody on rainy nights. I'm afraid she got that from me.$2

Entries.Neutral_7: Let's invite Victoria over for dinner soon.$0#$b#I don't want her to feel like I'm leaving her behind by joining our family with yours. She should feel welcome here, too.$0

Entries.Introduction: Oh my, aren't you the dashing one! Welcome to the valley, dear.$6#$b#It's so exciting when someone new moves in!$1#$e#Have you met my daughter, Victoria?$3
Entries.Resort_Bar: I may have had a drink too many...$4
Entries.married_Victor: I always knew my daughter would find her special someone in life. I'm happy that it's you, @. My doors are always open to family. Don't be a stranger!$3
Entries.Tue8: Yoga is a physical, mental, and spiritual practice! Whenever you have some spare time, I'd love to teach you some poses.$3
Entries.summer_Fri: I've been spending more time painting lately.$1#$e#There's so much to learn. So many different styles and techniques... it's a little overwhelming.$0
Entries.fall_22: Despite the fact I was an accounting manager at Joja, I never shop at their stores, and never will.$0#$e#Their products aren't healthy, and they'd damage my complexion.$6
Entries.fall_Tue8: I've been doing yoga for many years. It's helped tone my body and concentrate my mind to a balanced state.$3#$e#You should join us sometime, @.$1
Entries.fall_Wed8: Caroline and Jodi are my best friends. We've been through so much together.$1#$e#The three of us are mothers. We see eye to eye on many things, and rely on each other for support.$3
Entries.fall_Fri: Fall is just the most marvelous season for fashion, don't you think, @?$3#$b#Dresses, jackets, layers...so many possibilities. I love it!$3
Entries.winter_Tue2: My mother and father are visiting soon. Everything has to be perfect!$0#$e#...Maybe you'll meet them someday, sweetie. Then you'll understand.$6
Entries.winter_Fri8: I finally managed to order a vintage that's in high demand from a vineyard just north of Grampleton. They gave me an extra bottle!$3#$e#I want you to have it, dear. Everyone should get to enjoy nice things once in a while, especially you.[348]$1
Entries.Olivia_event2: Oh, your grandfather?$0#$b#I can't imagine a scenario where he wouldn't be.$3
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Negative: Oh, this is for my birthday?... Thank you. Maybe one of Victoria's friends will like it.$2
Entries.divorced_Victor: Victoria rarely leaves her room now... It's an utter shame you two couldn't find a compromise in your marriage.$2#$e#I thought you two were perfect for each other. What happened, @? Can I even ask you that?$2
Entries.Mon: I wonder if any of Victoria's friends want a part-time job cleaning the house. It'd save me a lot of time.$6
Entries.Thu6: Will you be at the saloon tomorrow, @? You may see me there. Victoria goes every Friday to hang out with her friends.$3
Entries.summer_Sun4: Jodi told me Vincent isn't doing well in math. She has so much to worry about...$2#$e#I may ask Victoria if she can tutor her. If not, I suppose I do have a knack for math from trading...$3
Entries.fall_9: I'm visiting Blue Moon Vineyard tomorrow to order more wine from Sophia.$3#$b#I sometimes have Victoria go, but I want to see the Gem Sea from the cliff. It's a beautiful view.$1#$e#I'd like to go with you sometime... will you join me there?$3
Entries.fall_26: Spirit's Eve is tomorrow, @!?$1#$e#Victoria has a tendency to get lost in the maze. She always seems to get caught in rough situations.$6
Entries.fall_Mon: During fall, I may sometimes take trips in the forest to gather some mushrooms.$0#$b#I wish Victoria enjoyed mushrooms as much as I did. I'd use them in just about every dish.$6
Entries.fall_Mon4: I saw %pet walking around town yesterday. Such an adorable animal!$1#$e#%pet reminds me of Dewey... Victoria loved that cat so much.$2#$e#Has he told you about Dewey yet? ...Losing that cat broke her heart, poor thing.$2
Entries.fall_Tue6: I tried to get Victoria to do yoga with me and she refused to even try it.$6#$e#I suppose I'll just stick to Tuesdays. Emily loves our yoga days.$3
Entries.fall_Sat10: I went foraging for fresh mushrooms and cooked what I found. I saved some for you, dear![205]$4#$e#I wish Victoria enjoyed mushrooms as much as I do.$6

Entries.fall_Sat10: I went foraging for fresh mushrooms and cooked what I found. I saved some for you, dear![205]$4#$e#I wish Victoria enjoyed mushrooms as much as I do.$6

Entries.Introduction: Oh my, aren't you the dashing one! Welcome to the valley, dear.$6#$b#It's so exciting when someone new moves in!$1#$e#Have you met my daughter, Victoria?$3
Entries.Resort_Bar: I may have had a drink too many...$4
Entries.married_Victor: I always knew my daughter would find her special someone in life. I'm happy that it's you, @. My doors are always open to family. Don't be a stranger!$3
Entries.Tue8: Yoga is a physical, mental, and spiritual practice! Whenever you have some spare time, I'd love to teach you some poses.$3
Entries.summer_Fri: I've been spending more time painting lately.$1#$e#There's so much to learn. So many different styles and techniques... it's a little overwhelming.$0
Entries.fall_22: Despite the fact I was an accounting manager at Joja, I never shop at their stores, and never will.$0#$e#Their products aren't healthy, and they'd damage my complexion.$6
Entries.fall_Tue8: I've been doing yoga for many years. It's helped tone my body and concentrate my mind to a balanced state.$3#$e#You should join us sometime, @.$1
Entries.fall_Wed8: Caroline and Jodi are my best friends. We've been through so much together.$1#$e#The three of us are mothers. We see eye to eye on many things, and rely on each other for support.$3
Entries.fall_Fri: Fall is just the most marvelous season for fashion, don't you think, @?$3#$b#Dresses, jackets, layers...so many possibilities. I love it!$3
Entries.winter_Tue2: My mother and father are visiting soon. Everything has to be perfect!$0#$e#...Maybe you'll meet them someday, sweetie. Then you'll understand.$6
Entries.winter_Fri8: I finally managed to order a vintage that's in high demand from a vineyard just north of Grampleton. They gave me an extra bottle!$3#$e#I want you to have it, dear. Everyone should get to enjoy nice things once in a while, especially you.[348]$1
Entries.Olivia_event2: Oh, your grandfather?$0#$b#I can't imagine a scenario where he wouldn't be.$3
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Negative: Oh, this is for my birthday?... Thank you. Maybe one of Victoria's friends will like it.$2
Entries.divorced_Victor: Victoria rarely leaves her room now... It's an utter shame you two couldn't find a compromise in your marriage.$2#$e#I thought you two were perfect for each other. What happened, @? Can I even ask you that?$2
Entries.Mon: I wonder if any of Victoria's friends want a part-time job cleaning the house. It'd save me a lot of time.$6
Entries.Thu6: Will you be at the saloon tomorrow, @? You may see me there. Victoria goes every Friday to hang out with her friends.$3
Entries.summer_Sun4: Jodi told me Vincent isn't doing well in math. She has so much to worry about...$2#$e#I may ask Victoria if she can tutor her. If not, I suppose I do have a knack for math from trading...$3
Entries.fall_9: I'm visiting Blue Moon Vineyard tomorrow to order more wine from Soren.$3#$b#I sometimes have Victoria go, but I want to see the Gem Sea from the cliff. It's a beautiful view.$1#$e#I'd like to go with you sometime... will you join me there?$3
Entries.fall_26: Spirit's Eve is tomorrow, @!?$1#$e#Victoria has a tendency to get lost in the maze. She always seems to get caught in rough situations.$6
Entries.fall_Mon: During fall, I may sometimes take trips in the forest to gather some mushrooms.$0#$b#I wish Victoria enjoyed mushrooms as much as I did. I'd use them in just about every dish.$6
Entries.fall_Mon4: I saw %pet walking around town yesterday. Such an adorable animal!$1#$e#%pet reminds me of Dewey... Victoria loved that cat so much.$2#$e#Has he told you about Dewey yet? ...Losing that cat broke her heart, poor thing.$2
Entries.fall_Tue6: I tried to get Victoria to do yoga with me and she refused to even try it.$6#$e#I suppose I'll just stick to Tuesdays. Emily loves our yoga days.$3
